grackle:BersekerTotem.NAME: Berserker Totem
grackle:BersekerTotem.FLAVOR: If violence wasn't your last resort, you didn't resort to enough of it.
DESCRIPTIONS: All multi-hit attacks deal one extra hit.

grackle:PhoenixIdol.NAME: Phoenix Idol
grackle:PhoenixIdol.FLAVOR: A small carving of a phoenix, slightly charred.

grackle:LoftwingFeather.NAME: Loftwing Feather
grackle:LoftwingFeather.FLAVOR: The feather of a red Loftwing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter grackle:Aloft at the end of each turn.
